alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 01 at 3:52AM EST until December 01 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The steadiest and occasionally heavy snow is expected this morning through this afternoon. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4353 7508 4354 7511 4362 7512 4353 7529 4348 7542 4346 7543 4347 7570 4346 7581 4345 7570 4343 7580 4344 7545 4340 7568 4339 7556 4337 7556 4339 7541 4337 7542 4338 7527 4340 7526 4340 7508 TIME Y22M12D01T0600Z-Y22M12D01T1200Z
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
